page.title: 11THE POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office opens at nine o'clock in the morning.It sells stamps,postal orders,cards,sweets and deals with the licensing of motor vehecles,payments of pensions to the elderly and child benefit payments.you can also bank with the post office through the National Giro Bnk or Post Office Savings account.They also sell toys and games for children. Just outside the Post Office there is a post box where you can post letters to all parts of the country and the world.The van comes twice a day to empty the box and take all the letters to the Walsall sorting office.The letters and parcels for the village arrive early in the morning to be sorted out and delivered around the village.
